jd: From: vikash kumar, gvr infotek vikash.kumar@gvrinfotek.com Reply to: vikash.kumar@gvrinfotek.com Job Opportunity: Technical Lead (GCP)Position Type: Long Term ContractLocation: Seattle, WA (hybrid) or Remote (PST)Eligibility: Green Card holders and U.S. Citizens onlyMOI: SKYPE Need: Linked In , DL , VisaTop Must-Haves:Experience: 14 years in GCP (Google Cloud Platform) and .NETRetail Order Management: 2-3 years of experienceDatabase Expertise: Proficiency in Google Cloud SpannerLeadership: Strong background in leading projects and teamsRole Overview:We are seeking a highly experienced Technical Lead with 14 to 18 years of experience to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in Google Cloud Spanner, GCP, and .NET. This hybrid role requires excellent organizational and communication skills to manage multiple projects effectively.Key Responsibilities:Lead the planning and execution of multiple projects to align with company objectives.Oversee project timelines, budgets, and resources for successful delivery.Communicate consistently with stakeholders, keeping them informed of project status and risks.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure project requirements are clearly defined.Utilize GCP, Google Cloud Spanner, and .NET to develop technical solutions that meet project goals.Monitor project progress and make necessary adjustments to ensure completion.Adhere to company policies and standards throughout all projects.Conduct regular project reviews and post-project evaluations to identify improvement areas.Develop and maintain comprehensive project documentation.Facilitate effective team collaboration to drive project success.Identify and mitigate potential project risks.Provide mentorship and guidance to junior team members.Qualifications:Minimum of 14 years of experience in program management.Expertise in Google Cloud Spanner, GCP, and .NET.Strong organizational and communication skills.Ability to manage multiple projects simultaneously.Experience in a hybrid work model.Proficiency in project management tools and methodologies.
